SkinCeuticals Serum 20 AOX+

Brand: SkinCeuticals

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: aqua / water / eau, ascorbic acid, ethoxydiglycol, propylene glycol, glycerin, zinc sulfate, phenoxyethanol, sodium hydroxide, panthenol, ferulic acid, sodium hyaluronate

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunot
Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
